summary: This is an email from a US Department of Justice Communication Technician to Jeff Cranor at Signet Inc., dated August 10, 2019, regarding a quote for MCC New York and containing a hard drive list as an attachment. The document appears to be procurement or technical correspondence related to Metropolitan Correctional Center infrastructure.

persons.name: Jeff Cranor
persons.context: Email recipient at Signet Inc. who is being sent information about MCC New York quotes and a hard drive list.

events.title: Email regarding MCC New York quote and hard drive list
events.description: A Communication Technician from the US Department of Justice sends an email to Jeff Cranor at Signet Inc. containing budgetary quotes for MCC New York and a hard drive list.

locations: MCC-New York, 150 Park Row, New York, NY 10007-1704
keyFacts: The email is dated August 10, 2019, which is shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's death in custody on August 10, 2019.
The correspondence involves a US Department of Justice Communication Technician at MCC New York.
The email includes attachments related to MCC New York budgetary quotes and a hard drive list.
The recipient is Jeff Cranor at Signet Inc., suggesting potential procurement or technical services relationship.
The document shows ongoing operational activities at MCC New York around the time of Epstein's death.
